cohort.name: No First Consult Created Within 48 Hours
cohort.story: Among a cohort of 299 users who did not create their first consult within 48 hours, we observed an 11% drop-off rate. This indicates a potential barrier in the activation process that may be impacting user engagement. Addressing this issue could streamline workflows and enhance user experience, ultimately leading to more efficient onboarding.
